name: War.io : Survival Battle Royale
description: To all fans of battle ground is dedicated: War.io Survival Battle Royale - this is a huge fight in the deathmatch mode. A new 2d top-down shooter takes you to a world where you have to fight for your own life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 140 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM Storage: 140 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
